title: ChestCommands菜单,打不开菜单
author: Tommer
txt_content:
本帖最后由 lichi2050 于 2016-6-24 18:36 编辑 

可以被加载 是不是有什么不对
######################
#+                  +#
#   MENU SETTINGS    #
#+                  +#
######################

menu-settings:

  # name - appears as the title - REQUIRED
  name: '&2菜单'

  # rows - the number of rows of the chest - REQUIRED
  rows: 5

  # command - OPTIONAL (you can remove this or set it to '')
  command: 'cd'

  # open-with-item - OPTIONAL (you can remove this or
  # set the item-id/data-value to 0)
  # In this case it will open with a book (right click)
  open-with-item:
    item-id: 347
    left-click: true
    right-click: true
#   data-value: 0

######################
#+                  +#
#       ITEMS        #
#+                  +#
######################


website:
  COMMAND: 'spawn'
  NAME: '&9传送到主城'
  LORE:
    - '主城是最安全的地方哦~.'
    - '点我吧~点我吧.'
  ID: 120
  POSITION-X: 1
  POSITION-Y: 1


tutorial:
  COMMAND: 'warp shop'
  NAME: '&a传送到商店'
  LORE:
    - '你可以在这里收购还有出售哦~'
    - '致富的重要通道~'
  ID: 54
  KEEP-OPEN: false
  POSITION-X: 2
  POSITION-Y: 1


example:
  COMMAND: 'ride'
  NAME: '&e开启乘骑模式'
  LORE:
    - '可以乘骑玩家/动物.'
    - '某人:我要骑辅助'
  ID: 329
  POSITION-X: 1
  POSITION-Y: 5


admin:
  COMMAND: '233'
  NAME: '&c@玩家教程'
  LORE:
    - '聊天框输入你要@的玩家'
    - '@fsg 还钱！'
    - '就可以了，注意大小写.'
  ID: 102
  POSITION-X: 2
  POSITION-Y: 5


shop:
  COMMAND: 'co i'
  NAME: '&d查询方块破坏记录开/关'
  LORE:
    - '什么!?房子没了？辅助又不在？哈哈哈,看我查你水表!'
    - '&c让你知道谁动了你的东西.'
  ID: 327
  POSITION-X: 1
  POSITION-Y: 4


tpr:
  COMMAND: 'tpr'
  NAME: '&2生存随机传送'
  LORE:
    - '你已经成精了！生存去吧!boy'
  ID: 2
  POSITION-X: 9
  POSITION-Y: 1


home:
  COMMAND: 'home'
  NAME: '&d回家'
  LORE:

  POSITION-X: 9
  POSITION-Y: 2

  POSITION-X: 9
  POSITION-Y: 3

  POSITION-Y: 4

team:

back:

replies.txt_content: 可以了没事了 自己解决了
